General_Description: '''Bounty on an Athenian Ship''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra received a bounty on an [[Athens|Athenian]] ship, and moved to carry out the contract.
Section_Messages:
The bounty posted on a [[message board]] varied, depending on the ship in question.
*"''The Athenian ship [[Piraeus]] keeps raiding [[Sparta]]n allies and rampaging their coastline. Someone needs to put an end to this, or many cities will succumb from attrition.''"

*"''Athens built the [[Delos (ship)|Delos]] as a symbol of their [[Delian League|alliance]], and it galvanizes the mood of their troops. Hit them where it hurts and clear it from the horizon.''"

*"''Athens sent its mighty [[trireme]] [[Salaminia]] to deal a massive blow to the Spartan fleet. Stop it before Athens monopolizes the [[Aegean Sea|Aegean]] for good.''"

*"''[[Glory of the Law]] is one of 200 ships built under [[Themistokles]]' command. Still at sea after many battles against [[Iran|Persia]], this ship continues to terrorize coastlines. Sink it once and for all.''"
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sunk the ship and collected her reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
